title: Phase 2: Data Layer - Storage and CRUD operations
description: Set up IndexedDB for images, localStorage for boards/cards. Create TypeScript interfaces, database wrappers, and CRUD hooks. Implement image compression and thumbnail generation.
close_reason: Phase 2 Data Layer complete

title: Define TypeScript interfaces for data models
description: Create types for Board, Card, StoredImage as specified in spec. Include UUID fields, timestamps, imageCrop, metadata.
close_reason: Closed

title: Implement IndexedDB wrapper (db.ts)
description: Create lib/db.ts with typed wrapper for IndexedDB. Support storing/retrieving blobs. Handle versioning and migrations.
close_reason: Closed

title: Implement localStorage wrapper (storage.ts)
description: Create lib/storage.ts with typed JSON storage for boards and cards. Handle serialization, error recovery.
close_reason: Closed

title: Implement image compression utility
description: Create lib/imageUtils.ts with compressImage function. Use canvas to resize, convert to JPEG, target <100KB for full, <50KB for thumbnail.
close_reason: Implemented image compression and thumbnail generation in imageUtils.ts with full test coverage

title: Implement thumbnail generation
description: Add generateThumbnail to imageUtils.ts. Resize to 200x200, compress aggressively. Return both full and thumbnail blobs.
close_reason: Implemented image compression and thumbnail generation in imageUtils.ts with full test coverage

title: Create useBoards hook
description: Implement hooks/useBoards.ts with CRUD operations: createBoard, updateBoard, deleteBoard (soft delete), restoreBoard, getBoards, getBoard.
close_reason: Implemented React hooks with full test coverage

title: Create useCards hook
description: Implement hooks/useCards.ts with CRUD: createCard, updateCard, deleteCard, getCardsByBoard, reorderCards (update ranks).
close_reason: Implemented React hooks with full test coverage

title: Create useImageStorage hook
description: Implement hooks/useImageStorage.ts wrapping IndexedDB. Methods: saveImage, getImage, getThumbnail, deleteImage.
close_reason: Implemented React hooks with full test coverage

title: Wire up EditBoardSheet data flow
description: Connect EditBoardSheet to useBoards.updateBoard() and useImageStorage for photo uploads
close_reason: Implementation complete - edit button and data flow wired up in single commit

title: Phase 1.5: Basic board sync to cloud
description:
Implement board synchronization with Firestore:
- Upload local boards to cloud when user signs in
- Download user's cloud boards and merge with local
- Conflict resolution: local always wins
- Offline-first: continue working offline, sync when connected
- Track sync state for each board
close_reason: Basic board sync to cloud complete

title: Create CloudBoard types and Firestore service
description: Define cloud board data structure extending local Board with ownerId, sharing settings, syncedAt; create firestoreBoards service with CRUD operations for /boards/{boardId}
close_reason: Closed

title: Create useBoardSync hook
description: Hook to manage sync state and operations: upload local boards to cloud, download cloud boards, merge with conflict resolution (local wins), track sync status per board
close_reason: Closed

title: Implement first sign-in migration flow
description: When user signs in for first time, detect local boards, offer to sync them to cloud, handle the upload with progress indicator
close_reason: Closed

title: Add sync status tracking to Board type
description: Extend Board type with optional cloud fields: ownerId, syncedAt, cloudId. Track which boards are synced vs local-only
close_reason: Deferred to Phase 2 - basic sync complete without per-board tracking

title: Add sync UI indicators
description: Show sync status on boards (synced icon, syncing spinner, sync error). Add manual sync button in settings or board view
close_reason: Deferred to Phase 2 - basic sync complete without per-board tracking

title: Phase 2: Friends System
description:
Implement friend system:
- Friend requests (send/accept/decline)
- Username search (find friends by username)
- Invite links (share links to add friends)
- Friends list UI (view and manage friends)
- Privacy settings (searchable toggle)
close_reason: Core Phase 2 friends system complete (invite links and privacy settings deferred)

title: Feature: Add multi-photo support per entry
description:
Allow each entry/card to have multiple photos instead of just one. This requires:
1. Update Card data model to support array of image keys
2. Add photo gallery UI in CardDetailModal
3. Allow adding/removing/reordering photos
4. Update thumbnail display logic

title: Phase 3: Board Sharing
description:
Implement board sharing and visibility features per social-fe-spec.md:
- Per-board visibility settings (private, friends, specific, public)
- Public link generation/revocation
- View friend's boards
- Share settings UI
close_reason: Phase 3 Board Sharing complete: visibility settings, public links, friend boards viewing, share modal

title: 3. Implement public link generation and revocation
description:
Add functions for public link management:
- generatePublicLinkId() - creates unique shareable ID
- revokePublicLink() - invalidates existing link, generates new one
- Update CloudBoard with publicLinkId field
close_reason: Implemented as part of task 1: generatePublicLinkId and revokePublicLink functions

title: Build TemplatePickerPage
description: Page to browse and select templates. Shows template cards in a grid, allows filtering by category. Tap to create board from template.
close_reason: Closed

title: Build TemplateCard component
description: Display template preview card showing name, description, item count, and category. Use hand-drawn design system.
close_reason: Closed

title: Create useFriends hook
close_reason: Closed

title: 1. Add BoardSharing types and visibility to board model
description:
Add visibility field and BoardSharing interface to CloudBoard:
- BoardVisibility type: 'private' | 'friends' | 'specific' | 'public'
- BoardSharing interface with visibility, allowedFriends, publicLinkEnabled, etc.
- Update CloudBoard type to include sharing settings
close_reason: Added generatePublicLinkId, updateBoardSharing, revokePublicLink, canUserViewBoard functions with tests

title: Phase 5: Card Management - Detail view and photo handling
description: Build iOS-style bottom sheet for card detail, photo picker (camera + library), pinch-to-zoom cropper, notes editing, and delete with confirmation.

title: Build BottomSheet component
description: Create ui/BottomSheet.tsx with Framer Motion slide-up animation. Swipe down to dismiss, X button. Handle backdrop tap. iOS sheet style.

title: Build CardDetailModal content
description: Create CardDetailModal.tsx inside BottomSheet. Large photo, name input, notes textarea, delete button, save button. Load card data.

title: Implement photo picker (camera + library)
description: Use input type=file with capture attribute for camera. Accept image/*. Handle both camera and library selection on iOS.

title: Build PhotoCropper component
description: Create PhotoCropper.tsx with pinch-to-zoom and pan gestures. Show image in square frame. Output crop data (x, y, scale). Confirm/cancel buttons.

title: Wire photo cropper into card flow
description: After photo selection, show PhotoCropper modal. On confirm, save full image + thumbnail to IndexedDB, update card with keys and crop data.

title: Implement notes editing in detail modal
description: Add multiline textarea for notes. Auto-expand as user types. Save to card.notes on save.

title: Implement delete card with confirmation
description: Delete button shows confirm dialog. On confirm, delete card and associated images from IndexedDB. Close modal, update list.

title: Build add card flow
description: FAB in BoardDetailPage opens CardDetailModal in create mode. New cards start at bottom rank. Require name, photo optional.

title: Wire tap-to-edit on RankCard
description: Tap on RankCard (not drag handle) opens CardDetailModal in edit mode. Pass card data, handle save callback.

title: Create Firestore friendship service
close_reason: Closed

title: Create FriendCard component
close_reason: Closed

title: Phase 7: Settings - Export, clear data, toggles
description: Build settings page with JSON export, clear all data with confirmation, sounds toggle, and about/version info.

title: Build SettingsPage layout
description: Create pages/SettingsPage.tsx with hand-drawn styled sections. List items for export, clear data, sounds toggle, about.

title: Implement JSON export
description: Export all boards and cards as JSON. Trigger download with timestamp filename. Exclude image blobs (too large), include image keys.

title: Implement clear all data
description: Show confirmation dialog warning data loss is permanent. On confirm, clear localStorage and IndexedDB. Reset app to fresh state.

title: Implement sounds toggle
description: Toggle switch for sound effects. Persist setting to localStorage. Default off. Wire to sounds manager.

title: Build about/version section
description: Show app name, version from package.json, link to source/credits. Hand-drawn styled footer.

title: Build useTemplates hook
description: Create hook to fetch and manage available templates. Should expose templates[], isLoading, error, and refresh capability.
close_reason: Closed

title: Update seed data with multi-photo entries
description: Add the additional contestant photos to the Singles Inferno S3 seed data to demonstrate and test multi-photo functionality.

title: Fix seed data loading bugs and add multi-photo support
description:
User reported multiple issues with seed data loading:
1. Male board not created correctly (only female board works)
2. Photos not loading for cards
3. Board cover photo not displaying (should show Singles Inferno S3 poster)
4. Weird interaction when clicking board - shows 'choose photo' dialog unexpectedly

Root cause analysis:
- BoardGrid passes IndexedDB key directly to BoardCard which expects blob URL
- No async layer to convert keys to URLs before rendering

Additionally, add multi-photo support per entry and expand sample data.

title: Phase 4: Templates & Comparison
close_reason: Closed

title: Fix: Male board not created when loading seed data
description: When loading Singles Inferno S3 seed data, only the female board is created correctly, not the male board. Need to investigate the early return logic in loadSinglesInfernoS5() and ensure both boards are created.
close_reason: Fixed early return condition from || to &&

title: 4. Add friend's boards viewing to FriendsPage
description:
Show friend's shared boards in the friends list:
- Fetch shared boards for each friend
- Display shared board count on FriendCard
- Navigate to FriendProfilePage on tap
close_reason: Added useFriendBoards hook and integrated shared board counts into FriendsPage/FriendCard

title: Fix: Card edit changes not persisting (RankList sync)
description: When editing a card's name or notes, the changes were saved to storage but not reflected in the UI. Root cause: RankList only synced local state when cards array length changed, not when card content changed.
close_reason: Fixed by syncing RankList when card content changes (commit ecbb3d3)

title: Phase 4: Drag & Drop - Ranking interactions
description: Implement Framer Motion drag-and-drop with dedicated handle, 105% scale on drag, displacement animations with wobble, 50% overlap threshold, live rank badge updates, and haptic feedback.

title: Build DragHandle component
description: Create DragHandle.tsx with 3 horizontal wobbly lines. Touch target min 48x48. Pass drag listeners to parent via props.
close_reason: Implemented drag-drop ranking with Framer Motion

title: Create useHaptics hook
description: Implement hooks/useHaptics.ts using navigator.vibrate or iOS-specific APIs. Methods: lightTap, mediumTap. Fallback to no-op.

title: Integrate haptics on pickup and drop
description: Call lightTap on drag start, mediumTap on drag end. Wire into RankCard drag callbacks.

title: Build BoardDetailPage with RankList
description: Create pages/BoardDetailPage.tsx with back button, board name header, RankList, FAB for adding cards. Persist reorder to storage.
close_reason: Implemented drag-drop ranking with Framer Motion

title: Build RankCard component
description: Create RankCard.tsx with photo, name, notes, rank badge, drag handle. Layout per spec. Wobbly borders, rank-based decoration (gold/silver/bronze for top 3).
close_reason: Implemented drag-drop ranking with Framer Motion

title: Build RankList with Framer Motion Reorder
description: Create RankList.tsx using Framer Motion Reorder.Group and Reorder.Item. Map cards to RankCard. Handle reorder callback.
close_reason: Implemented drag-drop ranking with Framer Motion

title: Implement drag initiation from handle only
description: Configure Framer Motion dragListener on DragHandle only. Rest of card should not initiate drag (allows tap for detail).

title: Implement dragging visual state
description: When dragging: scale to 105%, shadow to 8px 8px, elevated z-index. Use Framer Motion whileDrag or drag state.

title: Implement displacement animation with wobble
description: Displaced cards slide with spring physics + subtle rotation (-1 to 1 deg) during movement. Use Framer Motion layout animations.

title: Implement 50% overlap threshold
description: Configure Framer Motion Reorder to only swap when dragged card passes 50% of target card. Prevents flickering.

title: Implement live rank badge updates
description: As cards swap positions during drag, update rank badges in real-time. Badge shows current position, not original.

title: Implement drop animation
description: On drop: smooth spring settle to final position, scale back to 100%, shadow to 4px 4px. Use Framer Motion transition.

title: 5. Create FriendProfilePage with shared boards list
description:
Build FriendProfilePage.tsx to show a friend's profile:
- Friend's avatar, name, username
- List of their shared boards (that user can see)
- Board cards with tap to view
- Compare suggestion if matching boards exist
close_reason: Created FriendProfilePage with friend info and shared boards list

title: Add data import/export with JSON format
close_reason: Implemented import/export with JSON format, added Singles Inferno S5 seed data, and integrated into Settings page

title: Fix: Unexpected 'choose photo' dialog when clicking board
description: When clicking into a board after import, a 'choose photo' dialog appears unexpectedly but also navigates to the board. May be related to missing cover photo triggering unintended behavior. Need to investigate the click flow and photo picker trigger.
close_reason: Fixed by wrapping trigger in arrow function to prevent React functional updater behavior

title: Implement comparison matching logic
description: Create useComparison hook that finds matchable boards between current user and friends. Match by templateId or exact title. Return comparison suggestions.
close_reason: Closed

title: Implement board-from-template creation flow
description: When user selects template, create a new board with templateId and pre-populated items from template. Items should have templateItemId reference.

title: Implement swipe-to-delete gesture
description: Add Framer Motion swipe gesture on BoardCard. Swipe left reveals delete button. Confirm tap moves to trash (soft delete).

title: Implement trash recovery logic
description: Filter soft-deleted boards (deletedAt not null). Auto-purge after 7 days. Optional: show trash section or toast with undo.

description: Show template chips when board has no cards: Singles Infernal S5, My Top 10 Movies, Best Restaurants, Favorite Songs. Tap pre-fills board name.

title: Save button not visible in CardDetailModal - TabBar z-index overlay
description: The save button in CardDetailModal is not visible because the TabBar (z-50) overlays the BottomSheet footer (also z-50). Fix: increase BottomSheet z-index to z-[60] to ensure modal appears above the navigation.
close_reason: Fixed by increasing BottomSheet z-index from z-50 to z-[60] to ensure modal appears above the TabBar navigation. Added E2E test for save button visibility.

title: Fix: Board cover photos not displaying
description: Board cover photos are not loading. Root cause: BoardGrid passes IndexedDB key directly to BoardCard which expects a blob URL. Need to add async layer to convert keys to URLs. Should show Singles Inferno poster as cover.

title: 6. Add ShareModal for quick board sharing
description:
Create ShareModal.tsx for sharing from board view:
- Quick visibility selection
- Copy public link button (if enabled)
- Friends list for specific sharing
close_reason: Created ShareModal with quick share options for private/friends/public visibility

title: Implement agreement percentage calculation
description: Calculate agreement percentage based on position proximity. Find common items, compare relative positions, return 0-100 score. Display in AgreementBadge component.
close_reason: Closed

title: Phase 6: Polish - PWA, sounds, seed data, optimization
description: Configure PWA manifest and service worker, add optional sound effects, fetch and process Singles Infernal S5 seed data, handle iOS safe areas, optimize performance.

title: Create PWA manifest.json
description: Create public/manifest.json with app name 'Rank It', icons (192, 512), display standalone, theme colors. Link in index.html.

title: Source and process contestant headshots
description: Find headshot photos for each contestant. Crop to square (face-centered), resize 400x400, compress <100KB. Save processed images.

title: Create seed data module
description: Implement data/seedData.ts with contestant data (names, base64 images or asset paths, metadata). Export as array.

title: Implement first-launch seeding logic
description: On app load, check if Singles Infernal S5 board exists. If not, create board and populate with contestants in random order.

title: Performance optimization pass
description: Profile with Lighthouse. Optimize: lazy load images, use will-change during drag, minimize re-renders. Target 60fps, <3s TTI.

title: E2E test: full user flow
description: Use agent-browser to test: create board, add cards, reorder via drag, edit card, delete card, delete board. Verify on 430px viewport.

title: Create PWA icons
description: Design hand-drawn style app icons at 192x192 and 512x512. Match design aesthetic. Save to public/icons/.

title: Configure Workbox service worker
description: Install vite-plugin-pwa. Configure Workbox to cache app shell, Google Fonts. Enable offline capability. Generate sw.js.

title: Add iOS-specific meta tags
description: Add apple-mobile-web-app-capable, apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style, apple-touch-icon to index.html for iOS PWA.

title: Implement iOS safe area handling
description: Use env(safe-area-inset-*) in CSS. Ensure TabBar is above home indicator. Content doesn't hide behind notch.

title: Create sound effects manager
description: Implement lib/sounds.ts with preload and play methods. Load MP3s on demand. Support: paperLift, paperShuffle, paperSettle, crumple.

title: Source/create sound effect files
description: Find or create paper sound effects. Convert to MP3, <50KB each. Save to public/sounds/.

title: Wire sounds into drag interactions
description: Play paperLift on drag start, paperShuffle on card swap, paperSettle on drop. Respect sounds toggle setting.

title: Research Singles Infernal S5 contestants
description: Search online for official Season 5 (2026) contestant list. Gather names, ages, occupations if available.

title: Implement template Firestore operations
description: Create firestoreTemplates.ts with CRUD operations for board templates. Include getTemplates(), getTemplateById(), createBoard from template functionality.
close_reason: Closed

title: Add photos to Singles Inferno S5 seed data
close_reason: Added photos for all 13 cast members and poster image using CORS proxy

title: Research: Gather additional contestant photos (5+ per person)
description: Find at least 5 photos for each Singles Inferno S3 contestant to use for testing multi-photo functionality. Ensure photos are appropriate and can be used for seed data.
